alert.note: Alert for Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 05 at 8:41AM CST until further notice by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in North Platte NE has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Nebraska... North Platte River at Lewellen affecting Keith and Garden Counties. .An ice jam will cause water to infiltrate the lowlands along the river. For the North Platte River...including Lewellen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Platte River at Lewellen. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. Flooding may occur around Fairground Street, County Road 46, County Road 199 A and County Road 44 A east of Highway 26. Homes near and along the river may begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM MST Monday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 AM MST Monday was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 8.7 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.7 feet on 06/20/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (5 am MST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu North Platte River Lewellen 8.0 8.7 Mon 6 am MST 8.7 8.7 8.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 815 AM MST.
